title: Buying Rp in Japan problems.
body:
So I currently have a Japanese account and live in Japan. I'm trying to use a vanilla visa gift card to buy RP. But i am having difficulty buying RP. 

I've also noticed that when it asks for the number on the back of the card it has option for 4 digits. But my card only has 3 digits, I do not know if that is the issue. Please help.

I have also checked if it has money on it and it does. Please help. it is 3000å††. (Yen). 

help me please.

replies.body: First off, make sure that you've properly activated that card as most gift debit card like that need to first be activated online. If it's still not working go ahead and shoot me a screenshot (WITHOUT THE CARD NUMBERS) of the section where you're entering that card info.
How can i send you the pictures of the issues. BTW its in JAPANESE.
If you use something like Imgur or Gyazo you should be able to copy the image address and paste it here with .png or .jpg!

Hmmmmm yea it looks like you're entering it in the right place, but I noticed that the store tab is open in a web browser which is a bit strange.....

The JP store might function a bit differently than the NA clients store, so let's go ahead and make sure you're getting all the help you need. Hit up the JP Billing Agents in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new), and they'll be able to walk you through everything from there!
Also I kinda new to all this stuff.
